title: Operation CuckooBees [ML B-Side]
description: Assaf Dahan, Threat Research Lead at Cybereason's Nocturnus team, describes a recently discovered cyber-espionage campaign targeting the Defense, Energy, Aerospace, Biotech and Pharma industries conducted by APT 41, AKA Winnti Group - a Chinese state-sponsored APT group known for its stealth and sophistication.
content:encoded: Assaf Dahan, Threat Research Lead at Cybereason’s Nocturnus team, describes a recently discovered cyber-espionage campaign targeting the Defense, Energy, Aerospace, Biotech and Pharma industries conducted by APT 41, AKA Winnti Group – a Chinese state-sponsored APT group known for its stealth and sophistication.
